entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Moosomin
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:49 AM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -9.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Broadview 11:00 AM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022
Temperature: -9.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.7 kPa rising
Humidity: 89 %
Wind Chill: -14
Dewpoint: -11.3°C
Wind: N 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Freezing rain. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Freezing rain beginning this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with ice pellets ending overnight then cloudy. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind east 20 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Cloudy. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 16. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022
